ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
des: "Need a little twist to your chicken soup recipe? Try this one."
ins: Bring water, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, cooked chicken, onion, carrots, garlic, basil, and oregano to a boil in a large pot. Add tortellini and reduce heat to medium-low; simmer for 30 minutes. Stir broccoli into soup mixture and continue to simmer until broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes more.
